ISSUE.TITLE: Github usernames case sensitivity
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: Not sure how github handles usernames, but I seem to get logged in als "Niondir" in drone but in an earlier version it was "niondir". Now my admin permissions were missing, I just found out by looking into the database. If usernames on github are not case-sensitive, you should sanitize them in the database.
